Blog.post: yeah well we are sitting here... hungry not knowing what's for dinner! yupp it's only 3 so we go and get some burger king! yeah well we arn't hungry again until about 10:30 and then it's too late to actually eat! so when is dinner time? it ranges from 3-10 and i never know... now that my dad takes us all out to eat we never know... he eats whenever and then we have no choice lol! my family is too crazy! and i think that i am getting frustrated over this whole dinner thing! oh well as long as my tummy stay full i stay happy! lol

Tha Fat guy said: Hey man shut up your nothing in front of me, even my finger is bigger than your dick! So after he said this i said this:Yo alright chill,Would repeat that last line i didn't really get thatI heard you heavy breathing doing choking on your neck fat Man i can't believe how out of shape did you get in You've been talking for 30 seconds dude your already sweating Did you eat from the toilet? I can smell some gases Dude close your mouth you got a breath of a thousand ASSES Yo its either that or you rocking some foamy pitsYour just a fat slob with hairy baloney titsYou need to hit the sit up too your not exactly leans Forget fighting man you can't see your own penis Since its my school i know i am not getting hurt I am not gonna get dissed by a white fat Albert Now you get out of here and its time for you to quit Ain't no place for a fatty talking piece of shit And mine is bigger than your finger its as big as your whole head You think i am coming up short, well thats not what your mom said! You thought my heart was a toyWell aren’t you a stupid boy?I thought you liked meAs far as I could seeI thought you were attracted to my so-called wit and charm,When we sat down you even linked my arm. You started to rub my thighs And all that emitted from my mouth were sighs. My best friend was a spectator, at the end she was like ‘See you later’I drank from a cup and it spilt down my top and it looked as if his eyes would pop! I lifted the bottom of the top to see if my stomach had got wet,His hand was already up my top, Yeah you bet!His hand started moving up yonder And all I could do was wonderIf he actually liked me for meAnd not for my bodyHe had never acted this way before and I was being seriousI was positively sure As his hand was moving up, his other hand rested on my lap.I should have done it sooner. My hand went across his face, SLAP! Slightly altered to my liking..Roses are red,Violets are corny,Oh baby you make me horny,kiss me,bite me,eat me,blow me,suck me,fuck me..veeerry slowly,If you kiss me don't be sassyuse your tongue and make it nastyclaw me,whip me, choke me tight,slice me,dice me,a masochist delight You you are a girl (assume you are a girl if you are a boy)And it`s your first time.As you lie back your muscles tighten.You put him off for a while searching for an excuse, but he refuses to be swayed as he approaches you.He asks if you`re afraid and you shake your head bravely.He has had more experience, but it`s the first time his finger has found the right place.He probes deeply and you shiver; your body tenses; but he`s gentle like he promised he`d be.He looks deeply within your eyes and tells youto trust him-he`s done this many times before.His cool smile relaxes you and you open wider to give him more room for an ease entrance.You begin to plead and beg him to hurry, but he slowly takes his time, wanting to cause you as little pain as possible.As he presses closer, going deeper, you feel the tissue give way; pain surges throughout your body and you feel the slight trickle of blood as he continues.He looks at you concerned and asks you if it`s too painful.Your eyes are filled with tears but you shake your head and nod for him to go on.He begins going in and out with skill but you are now too numb to feel him within you.After a few moments, you feel something bursting within you and he pulls it out of you, you lay panting, glad to have it over.He looks at you and smiling warmly, tells you, with a chuckle; that you have been his most stubborn yet most rewarding experience.You then smile and thank our dentist... After all, it was your first time to have a tooth pulled!

Yeah well This is the first time me actually usuing this so i am like really excited... not really lol! yeah well I got to hang out with gary from mary land and we had a blast... i mean he is so kewl.. we wentto the saquoia National park... well not just me and him... it was me, him and my older sister.... we actually went bowling for a few hours and then went out to cold stone creamery... for the best icecream you can get anywhere... you can eat it and like feel so sick to your stomach for eating so much and still want more.. lol i mean not everything is like that... yeah well then we went to selma and hung out over there like at my sisters friends house... they were gambling, drinking, and having a fun time.. and me, my sister, and gary just sat there and talked... it was pretty kewl.. lol i mean he is leaving on the 12th i think and he wont be back until about next summer sometime.. and i am going to be sad... oh well... yeah well hopefully we can keep in touch and just chill out and have fun becasue i mean maryland is like clear on the west coast and that's tooo long away! welll we have a few more weeks to hang out and have fun right?
